mapper.insert: INSERT INTO R_COMMENTS (COMMENT_ID, R_ID, U_NO, C_CONTENT, C_CREATED_AT) VALUES (R_COMMENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rId}, #{uNo}, #{cContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT c.COMMENT_ID as commentId, c.R_ID as rId, c.U_NO as uNo, u.U_NICKNAME as uNickname, c.C_CONTENT as cContent, c.C_CREATED_AT as cCreatedAt, c.C_UPDATED_AT as cUpdatedAt FROM R_COMMENTS c JOIN USER_VIBEVILLAGE u ON c.U_NO = u.U_NO WHERE c.R_ID = #{rId} ORDER BY c.C_CREATED_AT ASC

SELECT c.COMMENT_ID as commentId, c.R_ID as rId, c.U_NICKNAME as uNickname, c.C_CONTENT as cContent, c.C_CREATED_AT as cCreatedAt, c.C_UPDATED_AT as cUpdatedAt FROM R_COMMENTS c WHERE c.R_ID = #{rId} ORDER BY c.C_CREATED_AT ASC
